title: Data Marketplace Metadata - Data Distribution
description: Data Marketplace Metadata schema for when a dataset has a distribution associated with it

title.description: The full and formal name given to an information resource.

alternativeTitle.description: An alternative name used as a substitute or additional access point for an information resource.

summary.description: A short textual summary of the resource with a maximum length of 250 characters.

description.description: A concise narrative of the content of an information resource. A free-text account of the distribution.

keyword.description: Uncontrolled terms (words or phrases) assigned to describe an information resource.

theme.description: Topic: A controlled term that expresses the broad topical content of an information resource. Subject: A controlled term that expresses a topic of the intellectual content of an information resource.

creator.description: The business entity responsible for creating or compiling the original content of an information resource..

publisher.description: The business entity responsible for making an information resource publicly available.

securityClassification.description: An information security designation that identifies the minimum level of protection assigned to an information resource.

identifier.description: A unique number, code, or reference value assigned to an information resource within a given context.

relatedResource.description: A resource that bears a close relationship to the described resource.

DQ_RelatedResource.description: Does this data asset have a Data Quality Action Plan associated with it, consistent with the definition described in the Govt Data Quality Framework?

version.description: The version indicator (name or identifier) of a resource.

issued.description: The date on which an information resource was originally published or otherwise made publicly available for the first time.

modified.description: The date on which the content of an information resource is changed.

created.description: The date on which the content of an information resource is created or compiled.

licence.description: Reference to the legal document outlining access and usage rights for an information resource.

accessRights.description: A rights statement that concerns how the distribution is accessed.

distribution.description: A specific representation of a dataset.

title.description: A name given to the distribution.

accessService.description: A data service that gives access to the distribution of the dataset.

identifier.description: A unique number, code, or reference value assigned to an information resource within a given context.

modified.description: The date on which the distribution is changed.

issued.description: The date on which a distribution was originally published

licence.description: A legal document under which the distribution is made available.

byteSize.description: The size of the distribution in bytes.
